section.title: SoMono LFNoise
section.para: SoMono LFNoise is a controller machine that generates a random value every specified number of sequencer rows. It then either outputs the value straight to control a parameter of another machine or allows the user to interpolate between the random values to create slower sweeps. It can be used to automate parameters of machines in a random way, which is sometimes seen as adding a touch of "humanness" to the musical output, or to simply add movement to sound without investing time to manual automation.

entry.para: Rate in rows in which a new random value between zero and one is generated.

Interpolation type. Choose between None, which simply means that random values are output without interpolation, Linear which attempts to draw a line between adjacent random values and Cubic which generates a smooth curve.
